title: The One Where What Happens In Vegas Almost Stays in Vegas, and Children’s Book Author Jennie Guay
description:
Jennie Guay is the author behind the very cute children’s book, “Howie Blend,” and explains how her real-life family situation inspired the sweet story! She talks about the life-changing moment that led her down new professional and personal paths, and why she feels so strongly when it comes to representation and blended families. And Lala went to Vegas to celebrate the opening of Lisa Vanderpump’s newest restaurant at the Paris Hotel, and has plenty of stories about how she, Katie Maloney, and Ariana Madix spent a couple of wild nights in Vegas. Lala also dishes on the Parisian vibes including her own dress and vintage bag, shares another “slide into the DMs” story, and explains why she might be happier staying home with a good face mask and an episode of “Friends.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
